content.title: $9,000+ Raised in 24 Hours - Thank You!
content.creator:
Collinsawr
January 2, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We are absolutely blown away by your incredible support!  We're thrilled to announce that Collinsawr reached its funding goal in just 24 hours!  We are incredibly grateful to each and every one of you for believing in our vision and helping to bring Collinsawr to life.
We're currently at over $9,000 and counting, and we're so excited to see this community grow.  Your enthusiasm and early adoption mean the world to us.
We're now focused on making Collinsawr the best it can be. We'll be keeping you updated throughout the production process, sharing behind-the-scenes insights and exciting news.

Help us keep the momentum going! Share our Kickstarter campaign with your friends, family, and anyone who wants to experience the freedom of wireless CarPlay and Android Auto.
Thank you again for your incredible support. We can't wait to get Collinsawr into your hands!
Sincerely,
The Collinsawr Team
